hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(*) from (select * from TASKS) wmTempTable
select * from REPS order by ID desc
select count(*) from (select * from REPS order by ID desc) wmTempTable
hibernate-mapping.query: select id as REPS_ID,name AS REPS_NAME,channelType AS REPS_CHANNEL_TYPE,picurl AS REPS_PIC_URL,username AS REPS_USERNAME from Reps
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ID as REPS_ID,NAME AS REPS_NAME,CHANNEL_TYPE AS REPS_CHANNELTYPE,PICURL AS REPS_PICURL,USERNAME AS REPS_USERNAME from REPS
select count(*) from (select ID as REPS_ID,NAME AS REPS_NAME,CHANNEL_TYPE AS REPS_CHANNELTYPE,PICURL AS REPS_PICURL,USERNAME AS REPS_USERNAME from REPS) wmTempTable
select count(*) from (select * from STATES) wmTempTable
hibernate-mapping.query: select count(*) from Reps where channelType IN (:channelType)
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: CREATE TABLE ALLTYPES (INTID INT NOT NULL IDENTITY,BYTECOL TINYINT,SHORTCOL SMALLINT,LONGCOL DECIMAL(18,0),DOUBLECOL DECIMAL(18,8),BIGINTCOL BIGINT,BIGDECCOL DECIMAL(35,15) ,FLOATCOL FLOAT,CHARCOL CHAR(1),STRINGCOL VARCHAR(255),TEXTCOL CLOB(2255) ,CLOBCOL CLOB(8001) ,DATECOL DATE,DATETIMECOL DATETIME ,TIMECOL TIME,TIMESTAMPCOL TIMESTAMP,BOOLEANCOL BOOLEAN,BLOBCOL BLOB)

select count(*) from (CREATE TABLE ALLTYPES (INTID INT NOT NULL IDENTITY,BYTECOL TINYINT,SHORTCOL SMALLINT,LONGCOL DECIMAL(18,0),DOUBLECOL DECIMAL(18,8),BIGINTCOL BIGINT,BIGDECCOL DECIMAL(35,15) ,FLOATCOL FLOAT,CHARCOL CHAR(1),STRINGCOL VARCHAR(255),TEXTCOL CLOB(2255) ,CLOBCOL CLOB(8001) ,DATECOL DATE,DATETIMECOL DATETIME ,TIMECOL TIME,TIMESTAMPCOL TIMESTAMP,BOOLEANCOL BOOLEAN,BLOBCOL BLOB)) wmTempTable
select count(*) from (select * from PRODUCTS) wmTempTable
select count(*) from (select * from CHANNELS) wmTempTable
select count(*) from (select * from CUSTOMERS) wmTempTable
